management_password_tip: Suggest a combination of 6-20 letters, numbers or symbols
management_extension_member_introduction: Screen members freely according to their profiles, consumption behaviors, habits, etc. to distinguish members who are premium or undesirable, whose per customer transaction or consumption frequency needs to be increased, etc. so as to tailor precise campaigns and generate analytics report after activities in the system.

Provide different member tiers with different member points, and the system will also calculate and issue bonus points according to amount of spending. Points can be redeemed for cash deduction, gifts or e-coupons, which stimulates members to consume again.
management_extension_member_card_point: Set rules of member cards and points
management_extension_helpdesk_introducti: Instant communication: A user can click the online helpdesk icon to chat with service staff when visiting a corporate website.
Dialog transfer: Helpdesk staff can transfer a visitor to relative departmemt or personal to achieve barrier free communication directly.
FAQs ready: Helpdesk staff can quickly reply to users with the help of existing FAQs to improve corporate service quality.
management_extension_helpdesk_chat: Support efficient instant chat to troubleshoot customers' problems
management_extension_helpdesk_knowledge: Provide effective answer set with Knowledge Base
management_extension_member_menu: Enter WeChat Custom Menus, create "Members" menu, and set click action to Member Center
management_extension_member_illustration: Improve user stickiness via online member card system as well as points system.
Bring in more consumption through diversified points rules and precise offer issuance.
management_extension_helpdesk_illustrati: Get in touch with your users by offering multi-channel access, such as WeChat, Weibo, Webpage and Mobile App.
Keep in touch with your users via the exclusive mobile app and with the service hours 7*24 online.
management_user_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
management_extension_microsite_introduct: Quickly create your own WeChat 3G website through easy setting up; varieties of well-designed templates as well as custom templates allow you to either choose directly, or design your own style to reach the purpose of giving your followers a stunning browsing experience.
management_extension_microsite_illustrat: Build H5-based mobile websites across platforms, which are perfectly adapted to the WeChat/Weibo embedded display on mobile devices.
Decide the website style on your own by choosing varieties of well-designed templates freely.
management_account_expired: Account has expired, Please renew the authority.
management_channel_delete_step_title: Due to provisions of WeChat Official Account Admin Platform, to remove a WeChat public account that is bound, go to the WeChat Admin Platform to cancel the public account authorization first.
management_channel_delete_step_one: 1. Log in to WeChat Official Account Admin Platform, and click Add Feature Plugin in the sidebar menu.
management_channel_delete_step_two: 2. Click the Authorization Manager tab, and then click Details.
management_channel_delete_step_three: 3. Click the Cancel Authorization button to cancel the authorization to the public account.

management_extension_product_illustratio: Manage your goods flexibly and put them on shelves through multi-channels such as offline stores and online WeChat, which brings goods near at hand for users to buy easily and freely.
Support WeChat Payment and Alipay Wallet payment to purchase goods and pay anytime, anywhere.
management_extension_product_introductio: Flexible management: Input your goods information into the library, and put them on shelves through multi-channels such as offline stores and online WeChat, which brings goods near at hand for users to buy easily and freely.
Promotional activities: Know the promotion effect anytime by running real-time statistics on offline promotions and online redemptions.
Mobile payment: Pay anytime anywhere through full online and offline access to WeChat Payment and Alipay Wallet.
management_extension_product_stepone3: Put goods on shelves through different channels

management_extension_mall_illustration2: Goods management and spec properties are free to set up
management_extension_marketing_illustrat: Features like coupons as well as the "摇红包" and "猿粪" games diversify means of marketing.
Powerful data collection makes it easy to get information of attendees.
management_extension_mall_introduction1: An incentive is provided to encourage customers' consumption so as to implement customer care as well as improve customer loyalty. As a member incentive program, all the goods in the "Points Redemption Store" are involved in the points rebate program. Customers can directly redeem the points they earned for goods while shopping in it.
management_extension_mall_function1: Can manage multiple shelves, and put goods on shelves according to business requirements anytime
management_extension_mall_function2: Flexibly set points and inventories according to SKU
management_extension_mall_function3: Three modes of promotions make it easy to carry out a promotion
management_extension_marketing_introduct: Coupons: Send custom-tailored special offers and normal programs to customers to encourage them to participate in a merchant's online and offline activities.
Game "摇红包": Easily extend user base and enhance user engagement.
Game "猿粪": Able to customize game logics to meet the interaction scenarios of most users.
